title: S14 Ep74: The Ghost Between Us
itunes:title: The Ghost Between Us
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS discovers The Ghost Between Us with guest Pete Nunweiler.

On June 1, 2018, Pete Nunweiler quit his corporate America job to publish the first book in his paranormal trilogy called "The Ghost Between Us."

As a paranormal enthusiast, Pete decided to share some of his personal experiences in a fictional world. The Ghost Between Us trilogy is now his personal best-selling series. Today he shares the true stories behind this series.

Get his books here: https://amazon.com

Visit his site here: https://www.petenunweiler.com/

Support our sponsors for great deals!

Carnival Row is a one-hour fantasy drama series starring Orlando Bloom and Cara Delevingne . The series is set in a Victorian fantasy world filled with mythological immigrant creatures whose exotic homelands were invaded by the empires of man. Come together on August 30th to watch Carnival Row only on Amazon Prime Video this Labor Day Weekend!
